channel.title: Can I make a Private Offline Server?
channel.description:
I am just curious if I can make a Server that is offline and private for myself? I am asking because I am on Dial-Up Internet and don't think it would be a good idea to try to put it up online...
Before you ask any questions, my internet may be slow but I do eventually download anything. I've downloaded things over 100MB on this crappy internet so I wouldn't mind downloading anything big
I am also asking because ever since an update to RS that made it requires Java 1.6, I couldn't get on anymore.. Had to quit... So now I am hoping to create my own private server that is offline and I can play easily, without people ruining my fun.
Note: I am a PvMer type of guy so I don't mind not having multiplayer.
Anyways, can anybody tell me if it is possible and maybe help me out get it started?

item.title: Can I make a Private Offline Server?
item.dc:creator: @Jusey1 Jusey1
item.description:
@Jusey1 wrote:

adamgulka:

hey buddy, if you pm me a message then ill teamviewer you and ill make you a server!

Eh. Hmk.

Read full topic

item.title: Can I make a Private Offline Server?
item.dc:creator: @Jusey1 Jusey1
item.description:
@Jusey1 wrote:

[quote=“ultimatepkvillage, post:30, topic:434718”][quote author=Jusey1 link=topic=537436.msg3930686#msg3930686 date=1330646641]

There isn’t really any way to make it ‘offline’ All I can really say is, don’t port forward? And since you’re on a dial-up, I don’t think it would be online anyways. Since I don’t think you can port forward on dial-up. So I guess you can just do 127.0.0.1 like the first guy who posted on this said.

When I run it; it requests both a Port and an IP. The IP is 127.0.0.1 by default.
[/quote]

ip 127.0.0.1 or 0.0.0.0
port 43594[/quote]

I deleted that game already. Gonna need to redownload it then try that. I feel stupid now XD

Read full topic
item.source: Can I make a Private Offline Server?

[/quote]

When I run it; it requests both a Port and an IP. The IP is 127.0.0.1 by default.[/quote]

ip 127.0.0.1 or 0.0.0.0
port 43594

item.title: Can I make a Private Offline Server?

@Jusey1 wrote:

Demon6994:

There isn’t really any way to make it ‘offline’ All I can really say is, don’t port forward? And since you’re on a dial-up, I don’t think it would be online anyways. Since I don’t think you can port forward on dial-up. So I guess you can just do 127.0.0.1 like the first guy who posted on this said.

When I run it; it requests both a Port and an IP. The IP is 127.0.0.1 by default.

Make the ip 127.0.0.1 despite what internet you have this will only allow you to log into the server you wish to play by yourself.

I think your the kid

item.title: Can I make a Private Offline Server?
item.dc:creator: @Jusey1 Jusey1
item.description:
@Jusey1 wrote:

I am beast:

Are you looking for a newer graphic style, or an older graphic style?

I want most of the newer graphics stuff but not too big. I prefer to play in Safe Mode on RS so something like that with the newer graphical items.

As for what is in it… I want to be able to get my dreamed outfit which is Full Gilded Dragon Armor with Trim Attack Cape. That is the main thing I truly want in a RSPS.

Read full topic

item.title: Can I make a Private Offline Server?
item.dc:creator: @Jusey1 Jusey1
item.description:
@Jusey1 wrote:

I am beast:

Yup. Most servers are based solely on player interaction. I’m betting that one of the older sources, with more skills, will be more beneficial to helping you on the path of what you are wanting.

Yeah. Maybe you can help me a bit? It isn’t truly easy to search stuff on this Dial-Up + I kinda don’t want to download something I’ll regret, am I right?

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Jusey1 Jusey1
item.description:
@Jusey1 wrote:

[quote=“I am beast, post:12, topic:434718”]Download the Client and Source from a server.

(First one on download list):

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Just run them, and you a set to jet my friend. You most likely won’t need to even change anything. Gl and have fun battling those monsters my man. :D[/quote]

Yeah. Thx for the help… Just now I need to find a Server that suits my wishes XD… And it is also hard to find a Server that is purely base on PvM and actually had Enemies within it that requires PvP-Skills.

item.title: Can I make a Private Offline Server?
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

[quote=“cedrick, post:9, topic:434718”]go in client.java, gui ( in client ) go in server.java and client.java ( in source ) then find no-ip or 127.0 then replace all for 127.0.0.1

im not sure but its should work if u do that[/quote]
Read his question before giving useless answers.
